revised_title: Observations on the Alterations in the Structure of Rocks in the Basaltic Country of Derry and Antrim
tldr: The author examines the alterations in the structure of rocks in the basaltic country of Derry and Antrim, focusing on the Promontory of Bengore. He describes the various strata, their arrangement, and the unique geological features of the area, including depressions in the strata and the presence of whyn dykes.
